title: Carry My Heart
description: Jacob Phillips was my first best friend. I was his first love.We shared our first kiss together.He broke my heart.Sage Weston and Jacob Phillips met as children at Little Kitty Orphanage. They had the type of friendship that could weather any storm and they vowed that they would always be there for each other. And then Jacob was adopted, and everything changed. At first the letters were fast and furious but then they stopped and Sage was left all alone.Four years later, Sage and Jacob bump into each other at a university party. Sparks fly, daggers are drawn and Sage wants nothing to do with Jacob or the bevvy of women that seem to follow him everywhere he goes. Then Sage loses a bet, and she can no longer avoid Jacob. Though she does everything she can to let him know that they are no longer friends.But Jacob has plans, and is determined for Sage to know the truth about what happened four years ago, even if it costs him everything.
author: J.S. Cooper
